articles.title: Your current location can be tracked with a simple voice command to Google Nest - Daily Express
articles.description: GOOGLE ASSISTANT-enabled smart displays will soon be able to display digital Post-It Notes, messages for family members, and even track down a parent or children using data from Google Maps.
